comment.author: 48368539@N08
comment._content: Point of Information- in 1881 there were FIVE new regiments created from the existing highland  corps:  The Black Watch (Royal Highlanders), The Seaforth Highlanders (Rosshire Buffs), The Gordon Highlanders, The Queen's Own Cameron Highlanders  and the Argyll and Sutherland Highlanders. The Highland Light Infantry, despite their objections, were  classed as a  Lowland Regiment.
